Plot: Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.
Title: Ocean's Eleven
Writer: George Clayton Johnson, Jack Golden Russell, Harry Brown, Charles Lederer, Ted Griffin (screenplay)
Actors: George Clooney, Cecelia Ann Birt, Paul L. Nolan, Carol Florence
tomatoConsensus: As fast-paced, witty, and entertaining as it is star-studded and coolly stylish, Ocean's Eleven offers a well-seasoned serving of popcorn entertainment.
